item.title: It’s time to end the filibuster
item.description: Senate Republicans should not shy from doing what Democrats are certain to do.

item.title: Privatize air traffic control
item.description: Safely directing thousands of commercial flights every day is too important to be left to politics.

item.title: Zelensky may never have faced a more agonizing choice
item.description: U.S. officials tell me Trump’s peace plan is flexible, but a painful decision lies at its core.

item.title: Ukraine needs Russia’s frozen $200 billion immediately, Europe
item.description: With Trump seeking Kyiv’s capitulation to Russia, now is the moment for decisive European action.

item.title: Welfare fraud is far too common
item.description: People who want better social services should be more upset about what’s happening in Minneapolis.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene and the future of MAGA
item.description: The Epstein files caused the rupture, but tensions with Trump had been brewing for a while.

item.title: Winning elections requires showing up to work
item.description: No one expects DNC staffers to be as hardcore as Japan’s prime minister, but they can come to work.

item.title: Trump’s hard-sell Ukraine deal is realpolitik on steroids
item.description: Ukraine has bled for its sovereignty. Any final agreement must preserve it.

item.title: The Trump-Mamdani show
item.description: Zohran Mamdani receives his biggest endorsement yet.

item.title: Ukraine needs to work with Trump’s ugly peace proposal
item.description: The initial peace plan favors Russia, but that’s an opening for Zelensky to push for what he wants.

item.title: What city dwellers don’t understand about rural life
item.description: Readers wax poetic on town and country, plus menopause treatments and 50-year mortgages.

item.title: The most painful Trump clip since the ‘Access Hollywood’ tape
item.description: Readers weigh in on “Quiet, piggy” and Thanksgiving civility.

item.title: ‘This is not regime change’: María Corina Machado’s message to Americans
item.description: The Nobel Peace Prize winner discusses her Freedom Manifesto and whether Venezuela can move beyond dictatorship.

item.title: Snubbing South Africa
item.description: Trump’s decision to boycott the G-20 summit leaves a void.

item.title: Amid today’s unpalatable politics, here’s a public career worth savoring
item.description: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine has been fostering granular-level government for a half-century.

item.title: I was in solitary for 5 years. The world I’m reentering is sobering.
item.description: Finland offers Belarus a model to avoid Russian confrontation and a better future.

item.title: Ukraine is teetering. Why return to a failed policy?
item.description: Without a better strategy, America could see defeat of democracy in the heart of Europe
